overview: Norine Lawton is a young woman living by her wits in New York City. When she becomes friendly with Count Bonzi, a swindler, he enlists her aid in his scheme to sell worthless Mercer oil company stock to wealthy Christopher Gibbons, a retired war hero.
tagline: She used her wits to secure the luxuries she could not afford to buy until one day-
title: Beautifully Trimmed
